text: Open wing position of Male Heliophorus tamu Kollar, 1844 – Powdery Green Sapphire Heliophorus tamu, the powdery green sapphire, is a small butterfly found in India that belongs to the lycaenids or blues family. ==See also== *List of butterflies of India *List of butterflies of India (Lycaenidae) ==References== * * * * * * Tamu Category:Butterflies of India Category:Butterflies described in 1848
title: Heliophorus tamu
